incidents.name: [Global][Network] - Network degradation
incidents.message: Start time : 2022-09-20 11:32 UTC End time : 2022-09-20 11:46 UTC. In the context of continuous improvement, OVHcloud has migrated a peering configuration from a network equipment to another. During the maintenance window, a configuration change resulted in some external routes not being properly propagated, which resulted in: ⁃ localized links saturation ⁃ external traffic impacts Clients may have noticed during a short period of time (14min) latencies and drops (degradation of service). Our systems and operation processes made it so that network status was fully back to normal, ensuring full performance of our services as soon as 11:46 UTC.
